home.title: Home
home.text: Fourth-year Computer Engineering student at the University of Zaragoza, specializing in Computing. Skilled in teamwork, responsible and organized, with a strong motivation to continue learning and progressing.

textProjects.sishas: Web application for managing shishas and customers.

list.title: English Communication through Transnational Online Projects course (EnComTOP)
list.description: Participation in the course at the University of Oulu (Finland) in the fall of 2024. I developed teamwork skills by effectively participating in English in a transnational project with people from different European countries.
